ScoreBossGetControl.1007.2: Each Resilience Break inflicted on the boss by friendly units grants <color=#ec6d21>400</color> Technique Points. It can be triggered up to <color=#ec6d21>5</color> times, granting a total of <color=#ec6d21>2,000</color> points.
ScoreBossGetControl.1008.2: Dealing continuous DMG to a boss for 5s by friendly units grants <color=#ec6d21>225</color> Technique Points. It can be triggered up to <color=#ec6d21>24</color> times, granting a total of <color=#ec6d21>5,400</color> points.
ScoreBossGetControl.1009.2: Each Support Skill cast by friendly units grants <color=#ec6d21>200</color> Technique Points. It can be triggered up to <color=#ec6d21>10</color> times, granting a total of <color=#ec6d21>2,000</color> points.
ScoreBossGetControl.1010.2: Each Ultimate cast by friendly units grants <color=#ec6d21>200</color> Technique Points. It can be triggered up to <color=#ec6d21>10</color> times, granting a total of <color=#ec6d21>2,000</color> points.
ScoreBossGetControl.1011.2: Whenever a boss casts a skill that triggers Tornado, dodging the Tornado grants <color=#ec6d21>450</color> Technique Points. It can be triggered up to <color=#ec6d21>12</color> times, granting a total of <color=#ec6d21>5,400</color> points.
ScoreBossGetControl.1012.2: Each Blade thrown by the boss and destroyed by friendly units grants <color=#ec6d21>180</color> Technique Points. It can be triggered up to <color=#ec6d21>30</color> times, granting a total of <color=#ec6d21>5,400</color> points.
